H0.text: Monterrey, Puebla and Toluca are cities in which country. Mexico

H3.text: Monterrey, Puebla and Toluca are cities in which country. EUM

A4.text: Puebla is the fourth-largest city in Mexico, after Mexico City, Monterrey, and Guadalajara.
